job.title: Machine Learning Engineer
job.industry: Marketing y publicidad,Servicios y tecnologías de la información ,Recursos humanos
job.description: <strong>MACHINE LEARNING ENGINEER<br><br></strong><strong><u>Description<br><br></u></strong>Kavak is a modern, data-driven platform that has helped tens of thousands of customers buy and sell cars. We are the top e-commerce platform for cars in Mexico and one of the fastest growing and most highly-rated companies in Latin America. We have also been selected as <strong>Venture of the Year 2018</strong> by Expansión Magazine and the #LinkedInTopStartup 2019 ranked Kavak as the <strong>Second Best Startup to work at in Mexico</strong>.<br><br>We are looking for a creative, results-driven solution builder to fill an <strong>extremely challenging and exciting</strong> role as a member of the <strong>data science and machine learning </strong>team. You will create value for customers by optimizing decisions, automating processes, and personalizing the user experience using machine learning algorithms.<br><br><strong><u>Job Functions<br></u></strong><ul><li>Use machine learning to create new, scalable solutions for business problems</li><li>Design experiments, measure results and provide a point of view in decision-making</li><li>Work closely with cross-functional teams of skilled engineers and product managers<br></li></ul><strong><u>Basic Qualifications<br></u></strong><ul><li>Strong drive to learn, experiment, and drive outcomes</li><li>2+ years of professional experience performing quantitative analysis</li><li>Bachelors, Masters or PhD in a quantitative field (e.g. Computer Science, Economics, Statistics) </li><li>Expertise in Python<br><br></li></ul><strong><u>Preferred Qualifications<br></u></strong><ul><li>Experience in price optimization, credit risk scoring, or recommender systems.</li><li>An advanced degree (Masters, PhD) in a quantitative field (e.g. Computer Science, Economics, Statistics)</li><li>Experience with libraries commonly used for machine learning, such as Tensorflow/Pytorch/MXNet, XGBoost, pandas, numpy</li><li>Experience using AWS or other cloud platforms</li><li>A consistent record of using data to drive product teams to achieve ambitious goals and influence outcomes</li><li>Experience in schema design and dimensional data modeling and building data pipelines<br></li></ul>If you are motivated to be part of this mission and help us build the rest of this story, <strong>Join KAVAK!</strong>
